title: Data Migrations Don’t Have to Come with Downtime
Meet us at FOSDEM, Brussels, Belgium
description:
FOSDEM in Brussels is one of our favorite conferences each year as it fully reflects our love for Free and Open Source software.
We strongly believe in sharing knowledge not only internally, but also with the tech community around the world. This is one of the reasons why we support Open Source software through development and sponsorship. For example, we are the second biggest supporter on Open Collective and we have a ton of our own Open Source projects too.

title: Our top tips for remote working tools and practices
description: At Novoda we fully embrace remote working. Here you can find the most valuable tools and best practices to get the best out of each, for working as a global collective building digital products.
